excerpt: We wish to inform you of sponsorship opportunities for our upcoming conference being held May 26-29, 2025, at the University of Calgary, Calgary, Alberta. The 2025 AI·CRV Conference is a collaboration of two leading conferences: The Thirty-Eighth Canadian Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and The Twenty-Second Conference on Robots and Vision (CRV). Together, the conferences attract hundreds of research leaders, top graduate students, and postdoctoral fellows from Canadian and international institutions, together with innovation leaders from industry and government, to showcase Canada's ingenuity, innovation, and leadership in intelligent systems and advanced information and communications technology.
